title: Poster, "Benjamin Franklin, Celebrating 200 years", 1990
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
signed: Signature imprinted in dark gray ink, lower right corner: Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in white, upper center: '90; in black ink, lower center: B. Franklin; in black and white, lower left quadrant: 1790-1990/ Celebrating 200 years/ of his Genius; in black ink, lower left edge, sideways: Typesetting: PDR, New York Printing: Mossberg & Co., South Bend, IN
description: Long vertical rectangular poster with gray background; '90 printed in white across upper center.  Inside "0" Benjamin Franklin's silhouette in gray.  Across lower center Franklin's signature in black.  At lower left, imprinted in black and white description of anniversary celebration.
